articles.description: The Modi government’s refusal to accept advice from its own scientists and to be guided by indisputable data is one of the main causes of the COVID-19 crisis, the public health expert said.
articles.content: One of the worlds most highly regarded experts on global health has said the Modi governments refusal to accept advice from its own scientists as well as its refusal to be guided by indisputable data… [+3944 chars]
